languages.text: Requires an equipped shield. The Arbitrator chooses an enemy within a 6-cell radius and protected by shield side. Next attack by this enemy to Arbitator will be reflect with 50% damage to closest enemy.

traits.locale_text: Requires an equipped shield. The Arbitrator chooses an enemy within a 6-cell radius and protected by shield side. Next attack by this enemy to Arbitator will be reflect with 50% damage to closest enemy.

languages.text:
The Arbitrator chooses an enemy within a 6-cell radius. This cell must be on the same side as the Arbitrator's shield. The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from that enemy's next successful attack against the Arbitrator will be reduced by −50% and redirected toward the enemy closest to the Arbitrator shielded side.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a shield equipped.
languages.original_text:
Арбитр выбирает противника в радиусе 6 клеток от себя со стороны, защищенной щитом. {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Урон{/g} от следующей успешной атаки этого противника, направленной в арбитра, будет сокращен на 50% и перенаправлен в противника, ближайшего к арбитру со стороны, защищенной щитом.
! Эту {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} можно использовать только при наличии щита.

traits.locale_text:
The Arbitrator chooses an enemy from the side protected by the shield within a 6-cell radius. The damage from that enemy's next succesful attack against the Arbitrator will be reduced by −50% and redirected towards the enemy closest to the Arbitrator from the side protected by the shield.
! This ability can only be used with a shield equipped.

The Arbitrator chooses an enemy within a 6-cell radius. This cell must be on the same side as the Arbitrator's shield. The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from that enemy's next successful attack against the Arbitrator will be reduced by −50% and redirected toward the enemy closest to the Arbitrator shielded side.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a shield equipped.

The Arbitrator chooses an enemy within a 6-cell radius. This cell must be on the same side as the Arbitrator's shield. The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from that enemy's next successful attack against the Arbitrator will be reduced by −50% and redirected toward the enemy closest to the Arbitrator shielded side.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a shield equipped.

The Arbitrator chooses an enemy within a 6-cell radius. This cell must be on the same side as the Arbitrator's shield. The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from that enemy's next successful attack against the Arbitrator will be reduced by −50% and redirected toward the enemy closest to the Arbitrator shielded side.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a shield equipped.

languages.text:
Yargıcı, 6 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki bir düşmanı seçer. Bu hücre, Yargıcı'nın kalkanıyla aynı tarafta olmalıdır. Bu düşmanın Yargıcı'ya yapacağı bir sonraki başarılı saldırının vereceği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g}, %50 azalır ve Yargıcı'nın kalkanla korunan tarafına en yakın düşmana yönlendirilir.
! Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, yalnızca kalkan kuşanılmışsa kullanılabilir.
languages.original_text:
The Arbitrator chooses an enemy within a 6-cell radius. This cell must be on the same side as the Arbitrator's shield. The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from that enemy's next successful attack against the Arbitrator will be reduced by −50% and redirected toward the enemy closest to the Arbitrator shielded side.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a shield equipped.

traits.locale_text:
Yargıcı, 6 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki bir düşmanı seçer. Bu hücre, Yargıcı'nın kalkanıyla aynı tarafta olmalıdır. Bu düşmanın Yargıcı'ya yapacağı bir sonraki başarılı saldırının vereceği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g}, %50 azalır ve Yargıcı'nın kalkanla korunan tarafına en yakın düşmana yönlendirilir.
! Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, yalnızca kalkan kuşanılmışsa kullanılabilir.

languages.text:
El Arbitrator elige un enemigo en un radio de 6 casillas que esté en el mismo lado que el escudo del Arbitrator. El {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} causado por el siguiente ataque efectuado con éxito por ese enemigo contra el Arbitrator se verá reducido en un −50 % y redirigido hacia el enemigo más próximo al lado escudado del Arbitrator.
! Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} solo se puede usar con un escudo equipado.
languages.original_text:
The Arbitrator chooses an enemy within a 6-cell radius. This cell must be on the same side as the Arbitrator's shield. The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from that enemy's next successful attack against the Arbitrator will be reduced by −50% and redirected toward the enemy closest to the Arbitrator shielded side.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a shield equipped.

traits.locale_text:
El Arbitrator elige un enemigo en un radio de 6 casillas que esté en el mismo lado que el escudo del Arbitrator. El {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} causado por el siguiente ataque efectuado con éxito por ese enemigo contra el Arbitrator se verá reducido en un −50 % y redirigido hacia el enemigo más próximo al lado escudado del Arbitrator.
! Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} solo se puede usar con un escudo equipado.

languages.text:
法务官选择距离6格以内的敌人，该名敌人必须与法务官的盾牌处于同一个方向。该名敌人下次攻击命中法务官时，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低50%，且此次攻击会被偏转至离法务官盾牌方向距离最近的敌人身上。
！此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}只能在装备盾牌的情况下使用。
languages.original_text:
The Arbitrator chooses an enemy within a 6-cell radius. This cell must be on the same side as the Arbitrator's shield. The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from that enemy's next successful attack against the Arbitrator will be reduced by −50% and redirected toward the enemy closest to the Arbitrator shielded side.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a shield equipped.

traits.locale_text:
法务官选择距离6格以内的敌人，该名敌人必须与法务官的盾牌处于同一个方向。该名敌人下次攻击命中法务官时，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低50%，且此次攻击会被偏转至离法务官盾牌方向距离最近的敌人身上。
！此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}只能在装备盾牌的情况下使用。

languages.text:
L'arbitrator sélectionne un ennemi dans un rayon de 6 cases et du même côté que son bouclier. Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de la prochaine attaque réussie de la cible contre l'arbitrator sont réduits de −50 % et déviés sur l'ennemi le plus proche du flanc protégé de l'arbitrator.
! Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ne peut être utilisée qu'avec un bouclier.
languages.original_text:
The Arbitrator chooses an enemy within a 6-cell radius. This cell must be on the same side as the Arbitrator's shield. The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from that enemy's next successful attack against the Arbitrator will be reduced by −50% and redirected toward the enemy closest to the Arbitrator shielded side.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a shield equipped.

traits.locale_text:
L'arbitrator sélectionne un ennemi dans un rayon de 6 cases et du même côté que son bouclier. Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de la prochaine attaque réussie de la cible contre l'arbitrator sont réduits de −50 % et déviés sur l'ennemi le plus proche du flanc protégé de l'arbitrator.
! Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ne peut être utilisée qu'avec un bouclier.

languages.text:
アービトレイターは半径6セル以内の敵を選択する。このセルは、アービトレイターのシールドと同じ側になければならない。アービトレイターに対する次の敵の攻撃が成功することによる{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は-50%低下し、アービトレイターのシールド側に一番近い敵に向きが変更される。
！この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}はシールドを装備している場合のみ使用可能。
languages.original_text:
The Arbitrator chooses an enemy within a 6-cell radius. This cell must be on the same side as the Arbitrator's shield. The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from that enemy's next successful attack against the Arbitrator will be reduced by −50% and redirected toward the enemy closest to the Arbitrator shielded side.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a shield equipped.

traits.locale_text:
アービトレイターは半径6セル以内の敵を選択する。このセルは、アービトレイターのシールドと同じ側になければならない。アービトレイターに対する次の敵の攻撃が成功することによる{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は-50%低下し、アービトレイターのシールド側に一番近い敵に向きが変更される。
！この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}はシールドを装備している場合のみ使用可能。

languages.text:
Der Arbitrator wählt einen Gegner in einem Radius von 6 Feldern aus. Dieses Feld muss sich auf der Seite seines Schildes befinden. Der erlittene {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch den nächsten erfolgreichen Angriff dieses Gegners wird um -50 % reduziert und auf den Gegner umgelenkt, der der mit dem Schild geschützten Seite des Arbitrators am nächsten ist.
! Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann nur mit ausgerüstetem Schild eingesetzt werden.
languages.original_text:
The Arbitrator chooses an enemy within a 6-cell radius. This cell must be on the same side as the Arbitrator's shield. The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from that enemy's next successful attack against the Arbitrator will be reduced by −50% and redirected toward the enemy closest to the Arbitrator shielded side.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a shield equipped.

! Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann nur mit ausgerüstetem Schild eingesetzt werden.
